body: Rich, in The Mex Files, compares the situation in Egypt with Mexico's past and present. He concludes asking, "what will happen if the Mexicans decide it is time for a giant leap in Mexican power, in which the people of the largest Spanish-speaking nation demand that they be allowed to fulfill their potential?"
original_body: Rich, in The Mex Files, compares the situation in Egypt with Mexico's past and present. He concludes asking, "what will happen if the Mexicans decide it is time for a giant leap in Mexican power, in which the people of the largest Spanish-speaking nation demand that they be allowed to fulfill their potential?"
title: Comparing Mexico to Egypt

sentence: Rich, in The Mex Files, compares the situation in Egypt with Mexico's past and present.

He concludes asking, "what will happen if the Mexicans decide it is time for a giant leap in Mexican power, in which the people of the largest Spanish-speaking nation demand that they be allowed to fulfill their potential?"
